name: hugo-site
description: This is the repository from which the Hugo-generated version of https://www.brycewray.com/ is built.

scripts.dev:hugo: npm run install:hugo && exec-bin bin/hugo/hugo server --port 3000 --bind=0.0.0.0 --baseURL=http://192.168.254.10:3000 --panicOnWarning --disableFastRender --forceSyncStatic --gc
scripts.move-excerpts: move-cli public/posts/index.xml public/index-excerpts.xml && move-cli public/posts/index.json public/index-excerpts.json
scripts.testbuild:hugo: npm run install:hugo && npm run dev:hugo -- --minify --environment=production
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all clean clean:css style-exe:css --parallel dev:hugo style-dev:css
scripts.build:prelim: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean clean:css style-exe:css style-prod:css prod:hugo
scripts.testbuild: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean clean:css style-exe:css --parallel testbuild:hugo style-dev:css
scripts.testbuildpf: NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all clean clean:css style-exe:css build:prelim testbuild:search --parallel testbuild:hugo style-dev:css

author: Bryce Wray
